publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3573.1 Alasdair Allan: The Post Office, A People’s Bank—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3573) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end "also believes that these aims would be best served if the Royal Mail were not privatised, and calls on all Scotland’s MPs to sign the motion currently before the House of Commons opposing Royal Mail privatisation."
